wikipedia_page.main: Gerald Burrell (6 September 1924 – 25 October 2014) was a professional footballer, who played in the Scottish Football League for St Mirren and Dundee and in the English Football League for Huddersfield Town and Chesterfield during the 1940s and 1950s. He played as an outside right.He was selected to play for the Third Division North representative team in 1956–57.
